alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Benton, northwestern Washington, northwestern Sequoyah, Adair, southeastern Cherokee and southeastern Muskogee Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 829 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Siloam Springs to 3 miles northeast of Lake Tenkiller State Park to 2 miles northwest of Warner. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Stilwell... Tontitown... Lincoln... Warner... Westville... Vian... Gore... West Siloam Springs... Porum... Webbers Falls... Watts... Marble City... Braggs... Adair State Park... Christie... Greenleaf State Park... Cincinnati... Pumpkin Center... Maryetta... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 274 and 295. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
